ygData.subject: Re: Alliance Victory (Well Almost)
ygData.msgSnippet: The charges hit the shields. with the shields extended around KitKat they were weakened, the ship shook with the explosion of a few minor systems. Waste

The charges hit the shields. with the shields extended around KitKat 
they were weakened, the ship shook with the explosion of a few minor 
systems. "Waste recycled products. (See there can be more appropriate 
phrases instead of vulgarity.) What's the ships condition?"

The ship replied "Power to all systems fadeing, shields will be down 
with the next hit if appropriate measures are not taken." The 
condition of the ship was already beat up from the last battle, now 
it was hanging together by a paperclip and a wad of chewing gum.

He hated to admit it but he had to lower the shields range. "Decrease 
shield range to surround the ship, cut power to weapons and rerout to 
the engines." His actions would either fly them to safety or tear 
them all to ribbons.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Decadel::
> 
>       Decadel saw Deemos crawl away and the rest of em go to the 
Maximal
> base.  Then Decadel saw everyone get into the Predacon ship.  
hehehe stupid
> idiots.  If the maximals didn't kill them, if the Aliiance didn't 
kill them,
> then he would.  And if he didn't, they would win.  And he wouldn't 
let that
> happen.  He didn't need to be in the useless bunch of Predacons.  
He fired
> his shoulder plasma cannons at Phobia's ship.  To escape the 
explosion, and
> any returning fire, he went beast mode, and underground back to his 
lair.
> Good.  Hell Drak was still where she was supposed to be.  Or so he 
thought.
